name: ZENITH - Full
description: The astronomy-inspired "Zenith Sofa" stands out for its innovative design and imposing presence. With exceptional comfort, this sofa redefines the environment, adding style and elegance. Its name refers to the highest point in the sky, and this sofa seeks to reach the apex in design and comfort, being a centerpiece in any space.

name: FLAKE - Sofa
description: The "Flake Sofa and Armchair" are inspired by the beauty and uniqueness of snowflakes. These pieces combine form and aesthetics in an innovative design, with seats that mimic the organicity of flakes and a blended buclée fabric that offers a unique tactile experience. The design of the Flake Sofa and Armchair is a statement of luxury and modernity, ideal for environments that seek exclusivity and a contemporary atmosphere.

name: BUBUIA
description: The "Bubuia Sofa", whose name derives from the indigenous word that refers to the idea of float and lightness, is a piece that exudes tranquility. With an innovative comfort system and a versatile composition, this sofa is more than a piece of furniture: it is an invitation to relaxation and harmonious integration between different spaces. Its aesthetics and functionality make it perfect for environments that value tranquility and well-being.

name: ARGILA
description: ARGILA is a piece of sophisticated and contemporary design by Bell'Arte Living, which combines elegance and functionality in every detail, offering superior quality and unique style for modern environments.

name: KUYA
description: The "Kuya Sofa", inspired by the concept of shelter in the Tupi-Guarani language, is the perfect combination of casual design and functionality. Its back cushions, equipped with an intelligent mechanism, provide exceptional comfort. This sofa is ideal for moments of relaxation and relaxation, being a key piece to create a cozy and comfortable environment.

name: MONOLITOS
description: MONOLITHS is a piece of sophisticated and contemporary design by Bell'Arte Living, which combines elegance and functionality in every detail, offering superior quality and unique style for modern environments.

name: VISION
description: VISION » Chaise Vision, signed by Crystian Freiberger, is an invitation to reflections with freedom of perspective, free of anchors and limiting beliefs, an essence that refers to its rotating functionality, with 360° vision. TECHNICAL INFORMATION BLOCKS COATINGS/FINISHES Slide Title Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Button Button

name: CLOUD
description: The "Cloud Armchair" is a tribute to the beauty of nature, taking inspiration from the soft and organic shapes of the clouds. This design, synonymous with fluidity and lightness, is complemented by a coating that mimics the texture of sheepskin, providing a feeling of warmth and softness to the touch. The base of the armchair, robust and elegant, refers to the solidity of rocks and mountains, offering stability and durability. This piece is not just an armchair, but a work of art that stands out in any environment, adding aesthetic value and comfort.

name: LI
description: The armchair and the Li pouf together work as a single piece, a chaise to sit casually and enjoy relaxing moments, individually the armchair incorporates more sophisticated airs, with a design without edges and a double structure in solid wood that ties back and seat, bringing a "Q" of contemporary modernism.

name: AFFETTO
description: The "Affetto Armchair" is a tangible expression of affection and warmth, designed with the inspiration of Italian affection. Ideal for moments of intimacy and comfort, such as breastfeeding, this piece combines the elegance of contemporary design with functionality. Its 'cloud' fabric, which refers to the softness of clouds, provides unparalleled comfort, making it a versatile choice for various environments. This armchair is not just a piece of furniture, but a symbol of warmth and proximity, adaptable to different styles of decoration, from the most classic to the modern.

name: BOTERO
description: The following armchair proposal is inspired by the work of the famous Colombian painter Fernando Botero. The most striking feature of Botero's painting is that it always portrays plump and bulky bodies. This is a criticism of human greed, but always loaded with humor. With this in mind, the designers bring two universes together here: The unmistakable traces of the Scandinavian-style furniture (which makes a lot of use of wood) join the current aesthetic that values abundant, organic, curvilinear and upholstered volumes. The result is an iconographic piece, 100% upholstered, which brings new air to the high-end furniture market.

name: POUSO
description: Designed to be a mix between the pouf and armchair categories, the Pouso swivel armchair is a flight of creative freedom over conventions. Its creators, Leonardo Lattavo and Pedro Moog, find precisely in the idea of hybridism one of their main creative strategies. With several color options, this compact armchair, made with solid wood and upholstery, is extremely versatile and adapts well to any environment.

name: MESA ZENITH
description: ZENITH TABLE » The Zenith Side Table, inspired by the astronomical point above the observer, is an elegant and sophisticated extension of the Zenith Sofa, offering visual harmony and perfect fit. More than functional, this table transforms any space, bringing style and elegance, while complementing the concept of the sofa, reinforcing sophistication and balance in the design of the environment. TECHNICAL INFORMATION BLOCKS FINISHES/COATINGS Slide Title Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Button Button Button

name: MONDRIAN
description: A collection with a rational soul, inspired by the painter Piet Mondrian and his artistic movement, Neoplasticism, whose principles are based on absolute geometric rigor and the adoption of pure geometric forms. Practicality and attention to quality, ergonomics and comfort prevail in Mondrian products. As a result, we have the support given by rigid and linear structures in contrast to rounded upholstery that provide comfort, all with a high level of customization: from the finish of the structures to the height of the seats and the type of armrests of the same. The pieces in the collection, which range from the living room to the bedroom, include a modular system of sofa, chaise longue and armchairs, coffee tables, sideboards, desk, nightstands and bed.

name: MUSH
description: The "Mush Table" is a piece directly inspired by nature, evoking the shape of wild mushrooms. With a natural wood veneer top and a foamed base, this table is not only functional but also an expression of art and design. Ideal for spaces looking for a touch of exclusivity and originality, it perfectly matches modern and sophisticated environments.

name: DESK | MONDRIAN
description: A collection with a rational soul, inspired by the painter Piet Mondrian and his artistic movement, Neoplasticism, whose principles are based on absolute geometric rigor and the adoption of pure geometric forms. Practicality and attention to quality, ergonomics and comfort prevail in Mondrian products. As a result, we have the support given by rigid and linear structures in contrast to rounded upholstery that provide comfort, all with a high level of customization: from the finish of the structures to the height of the seats and the type of armrests of the same. The pieces in the collection, which range from the living room to the bedroom, include a modular system of sofa, chaise longue and armchairs, coffee tables, sideboards, desk, nightstands and bed.

name: TABLE | MONDRIAN
description: A collection with a rational soul, inspired by the painter Piet Mondrian and his artistic movement, Neoplasticism, whose principles are based on absolute geometric rigor and the adoption of pure geometric forms. Practicality and attention to quality, ergonomics and comfort prevail in Mondrian products. As a result, we have the support given by rigid and linear structures in contrast to rounded upholstery that provide comfort, all with a high level of customization: from the finish of the structures to the height of the seats and the type of armrests of the same. The pieces in the collection, which range from the living room to the bedroom, include a modular system of sofa, chaise longue and armchairs, coffee tables, sideboards, desk, nightstands and bed.

name: CENTER TABLE | MONDRIAN
description: A collection with a rational soul, inspired by the painter Piet Mondrian and his artistic movement, Neoplasticism, whose principles are based on absolute geometric rigor and the adoption of pure geometric forms. Practicality and attention to quality, ergonomics and comfort prevail in Mondrian products. As a result, we have the support given by rigid and linear structures in contrast to rounded upholstery that provide comfort, all with a high level of customization: from the finish of the structures to the height of the seats and the type of armrests of the same. The pieces in the collection, which range from the living room to the bedroom, include a modular system of sofa, chaise longue and armchairs, coffee tables, sideboards, desk, nightstands and bed.

name: IMAGO
description: Icon of the Metamorfose Collection, the Imago sofa represents the maturity of the brand by starting a new cycle in the design of increasingly timeless pieces, built with noble and highly durable raw materials, and designed in sustainable processes and handmade by our expert artisans. Fully articulated, the upholstery is composed of an ultra-modern and original retractable device, which is hidden in the structure until it is activated to support the body and head. The organic and curved arms are another highlight of the model, also available in the version with two modules.

name: COCOON
description: The Cocoon sun lounger brings a totally modern and updated proposal for the moment of rest and receiving. With an oval shape and a spiral curved backrest, the piece has movement despite the voluminous and futuristic design. Its comfort system involves elastic straps and layers of high-quality foams, and its feet are structured in waterproof mdf wood, increasing its durability. Sleeps well up to 3 people.

name: ATLAS
description: ATLAS is a sophisticated and contemporary design piece by Bell'Arte Living, which combines elegance and functionality in every detail, offering superior quality and unique style for modern environments.

name: LUME
description: LUME » The Lume sofa is one of those rare pieces that are born classics. Its differentials start with the 45° sanded chaise, which allows a bolder modulation for the living room, escaping the traditional rectangular chaise. Its backrests are free and the fixed seats have a greater perception of firmness and are slightly higher than other sofa models, making it easier to sit and stand up. TECHNICAL INFORMATION BLOCKS COATINGS/FINISHES Slide Title Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Button

name: PALOS
description: The design that surprises by its versatility is the central element of the Palos upholstery, a model inspired by the homonymous butterfly of unique beauty and considered the rarest in the world. Available with an island module, the sofa has the exclusive "one side" system for moving the backrests from the center to the end of the seat, which can be activated via touch or by voice command. Other modules with fixed backrests can be combined to compose an original decoration that complies with what the moment requires.

name: PUPA
description: Pupa, by Crystian Freiberger - Like a cocoon that protects and welcomes, the Pupa armchair presents an original concept for individual accommodation. With organic traits, its proposal is to meet living and home environments, including the most intimate spaces such as bedrooms. The fiberglass backrest adds, at the same time, lightness and durability to the piece, which brings another innovation: it is swivel. Confirming the comfort look, the armchair is composed of layers of foams on the seat, while the backrest has a highly soft hypersoft foam cushion.

name: YAK CAMA
description: Yak, by Ricardo Barddal - The Yak sofa, Eskimó name, is a piece inspired by the shapes of igloos, home of the Inupyak, a people who inhabit the Arctic region, the coldest on the planet. Rounded and organic lines are a strong trend in decoration, since the absence of right angles contributes to the composition of more fluid environments. In addition, the piece allows for different modulations, including an extensive, cozy and comfortable round chaise, as well as curved and straight modules of different sizes. A new version in bed format is available in the Metamoforse Collection,

name: VALENTINO
description: Valentino, by Studio Bell'Arte - With an elegant and striking look, Bell'Arte revisits the purest classic style with the Valentino sofa. The charm and impeccable quality of the backrest with legitimate captains requires the savoir-faire of Bell'Arte's skilled artisans.

name: FOLK
description: FOLK » Inspired by the cool and characterful style that lends it its name, the Folk sofa has firm - yet elegant - lines that hide behind its cover. This same cover provides, in addition to the casual look, incredible practicality, especially for those party and meeting places such as gourmet balconies, for example. The surprising comfort and feeling of involvement that the Folk sofa provides are only possible thanks to its seat cushions built with pocket springs wrapped with foams of special densities of the highest quality. TECHNICAL INFORMATION BLOCKS COATINGS/FINISHES Slide Title Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Slide Title Button Write your caption here Button

name: SHIRE
description: Shire, by Ricardo Barddal - Designed to compose casual, youthful and casual environments, where comfort and relaxation are indispensable. The detail of the fabric composition on the seats and the cushions in square, rectangular and roll shapes complement your modern look of the Shire sofa. There are several modulations available, which allows for a multitude of different configurations, easily adapting to any project.

name: LENÇÓIS MARANHENSES
description: Choose the version of Lençóis Maranhenses Version | INDOOR Version | OUTDOOR Waterproof fabrics with sun protection for semi-outdoor environments.

name: MAORI
description: Maori, by Ricardo Barddal - Inspired by the hospitality of the Maori people of New Zealand, the sofa follows the home living concept, which seeks to bring together in a single piece the clean look of a living sofa with all the comfort and functionality of the home sofa. With a modern and sophisticated look, the model provides a combination of lumbar and head support that, together with retractable seats and Hiper Flex foam back cushions, exclusive to Bell'Arte, provide an incredible feeling of involvement and comfort.

name: NAUMAI
description: The Naumai sofa was designed following the home living concept, providing in a single piece the elegance of a living room sofa and all the functionality and convenience of a home theater sofa. With a modern and sophisticated design, this sofa will revolutionize your space. Experience the ultimate in comfort with the unique combination of lumbar and head support. Retractable seats and Hiper Flex foam back cushions, an exclusive of Bell'Arte, guarantee an incredible feeling of coziness and relaxation.

name: NEMO
description: Nemo, by Ricardo Barddal - designed within the Home Living concept, which integrates the look of a living sofa with all the comfort and functionality of the best sofas intended for home theater, the NEMO sofa gives a show of beauty and practicality. Its structure and thin armrests provide lightness to the set of retractable seats and movable back cushions that offer the maximum comfort technology available on the market. With clean and sophisticated lines and several modulations, the NEMO sofa harmonizes easily in any contemporary project.

name: PACIFIC
description: Pacific, by Ricardo Barddal - The PACIFIC upholstery started from the "Double Side" concept, a strong trend in decoration in which the same sofa simultaneously serves two different environments. However, always one step ahead when it comes to innovation, Bell'Arte has developed a "Side-to-Side" backrest system, where, through an electric mechanism with touch activation, the backrests move from side to side, allowing each user to precisely regulate the depth of the seat that best suits the moment, both on one side and the other of the sofa.

name: GANESHA
description: Ganesha is a hand gesture that helps to strengthen and energize the heart by encouraging confidence, courage, and compassion. With generous proportions, a lot of comfort and a design that escapes the ordinary, the Ganesha sofa fits perfectly in a home theater environment or in a stripped living room. On the backrest you can see all its personality, imprinted by the curved plate covered in natural or synthetic leather and the steel detail simulating the fixation of the cushion. For this reason, it offers a complete experience in large environments where it can be observed from all angles.

name: SHEN
description: SHEN is a sophisticated and contemporary design piece from Bell'Arte Living, which combines elegance and functionality in every detail, offering superior quality and unique style for modern environments.

name: MAKO
description: Mako, by Ricardo Barddal - was specially developed to compose contemporary living environments that require a sofa with simple and well-defined lines, but without giving up a lot of comfort and excellent ergonomics. Seats and backrests composed of exclusive D-35 and HiperFlex foams guarantee this comfort and ergonomics. Several size options and modulations - including the armchair version - make this sofa an excellent option for residential and corporate environments.

name: PIZZANE
description: Pizzane, by Ricardo Barddal – With simple and well-marked lines, without giving up a lot of comfort and excellent ergonomics, it is the ideal model for contemporary living rooms. Several size options and modulations, including the armchair version, make this sofa an excellent option for residential and corporate environments.

name: OLDEN
description: Olden, by Ricardo Barddal - Its low, super comfortable seats and cushions with rolls refer to a casual but elegant look. A wide variety of modulations also allows several different configurations, making the Olden upholstered integrate and harmonize perfectly with any environment.

name: BERK
description: Berk, by Ricardo Barddal - The BERKUT are eagle trainers very prestigious by the Cazaks, who live in the cold and inhospitable landscapes of Mongolia. With contemporary and simple lines, but well marked, the BERK sofa exudes comfort thanks to a carefully crafted ergonomic design, in addition to the exclusive Bell'Arte comfort system - which combines retractable seats, backrest mechanisms with mobile lumbar supports and silicone fiber cushions.

name: YAK
description: Yak, by Ricardo Barddal - The Yak sofa, Eskimó name, is a piece inspired by the shapes of igloos, home of the Inupyak, a people who inhabit the Arctic region, the coldest on the planet. Rounded and organic lines are a strong trend in decoration, since the absence of right angles contributes to the composition of more fluid environments. In addition, the piece allows for different modulations, including an extensive, cozy and comfortable round chaise, as well as curved and straight modules of different sizes. A new version in bed format is available in the Metamorfose Collection.

name: MULLINS
description: Mullins, by Studio Bell'Arte - Mullins Beach in the Caribbean is the true translation of a tropical paradise. With warm waters and white sand, it offers its visitors a unique feeling of well-being and tranquility. It was to bring this feeling to everyday life that Bell'Arte created the Mullins upholstery. Its comfort system features the exclusive HR foam, in addition to being designed to integrate a touch system, bringing even more comfort and convenience.

name: BAY
description: Bay by Ricardo Barddal - The BAY armchair was developed to meet the growing need for furniture and decoration pieces that adapt to smaller environments, but without giving up comfort. Independent seats and backrests, mounted on a wooden base, the piece combines comfort and beauty, combined with the quality of a Bell'Arte product.

name: EVANS
description: Evans, by Studio Bell'Arte - The Evans has a distinctive mechanism that transforms the seat into a comfortable bed. When opened, the inner surface of the seat becomes a D-33 foam mattress with a beautiful embroidered jacquard top and the backrest with stitching details becomes a stylish headboard. The stitching details of the kidney pads and the piping of the arms give even more special charm to this model.

name: MIR
description: Mir, by Studio Bell'Arte – The simplicity of its well-sized geometry allows the model to fit lightly and discreetly into the environment. Its ergonomics and comfort are unique, thanks to a careful combination of foams, fibers and various comfort systems that you can only find in an authentic Bell'Arte upholstery. Its various modulations allow numerous compositions to compose modern and contemporary living environments.

name: NIDRA
description: NIDRA » The Nidra bench is a piece that embellishes any space. Its timeless design, with clean and straight lines, allows it to be used in different environments, from a bedroom, to a living room that needs a piece of furniture to divide and integrate the environments. name: MALI
description: Mali, by Ricardo Barddal – Available in two diameters - 70 centimeters and 1 meter, the pouf immediately refers to the idea of comfort and convenience, being a "wild card" in decoration. The round design, with rounded sides and turned wooden feet, gains an extra charm with the exclusive hand-made steering wheel seams. TECHNICAL INFORMATION BLOCKS COATINGS/FINISHES Slide Title Write your caption here Button

name: JURUÁ - Armchair
description: Signed by Larissa Diegoli, the Juruá Sofa translates the curves of the most sinuous river in the world into an organic and engaging design. Its fluid contour, solid wood deck, and side table with pirarucu leather top refer to the riverside landscapes of the Amazon, combining functionality, sustainability, and Brazilianness. A piece that transforms the space with comfort, presence and meaning.

name: ZENITH - Half
description: The astronomy-inspired "Zenith Sofa" stands out for its innovative design and imposing presence. With exceptional comfort, this sofa redefines the environment, adding style and elegance. Its name refers to the highest point in the sky, and this sofa seeks to reach the apex in design and comfort, being a centerpiece in any space.

name: FLAKE - Armchair
description: The "Flake Sofa and Armchair" are inspired by the beauty and uniqueness of snowflakes. These pieces combine form and aesthetics in an innovative design, with seats that mimic the organicity of flakes and a blended buclée fabric that offers a unique tactile experience. The design of the Flake Sofa and Armchair is a statement of luxury and modernity, ideal for environments that seek exclusivity and a contemporary atmosphere.
